# indexType

**Instance Property**

The size of each index in the index buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var indexType: MTLIndexType { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to a value that reflects the size of the indices in the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAccelerationStructureCurveGeometryDescriptor/indexBuffer] property, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLIndexType/uint16] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLIndexType/uint32].
